{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = Amped Wireless PCI20E.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = High Power AC1200 Wi-Fi PCI-E Adapter |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.ampedwireless.com/products/pci20e.html |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Amped_Wireless_PCI20E |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Amped Wireless |model = PCI20E |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 01/08/2014 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Amped_Wireless_PCI20E |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = PCIe |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = single-lane
|vendor_id = 10ec |device_id = 8812 |subvendor_id = 148f |subdevice_id = 20ef |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = ZTT-PCI20E, VYTLP-9094 |icid = 10233A-PCI20E |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Realtek;RTL8812AE; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = Loopcomm |manuf_model = LP-9094 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/09/2014 |estreldate = 03/2014 |price = 79.99 |upc = 850214003737 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |asin = B00I9AS1JA |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = Taiwan
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Per '''Amped''''s driver set, this device is assumed to be using 8812AE.. and the PCI ID is as shown in the infobox.
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces-2014/32292-amped-wireless-introduces-80211ac-pci-e-desktop-adapter ''Amped Wireless Introduces 802.11ac PCI-e Desktop Adapter'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :Covers '''Amped''''s announcement of the adapter at CES 2014
